title: Aaradhya Kundan Emerald Haaram: Regal Bridal Necklace
materials: meticulously crafted Kundan setting with uncut diamonds (Polki)
and accented with a vibrant Emerald. Features our signature Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting luster.
features: This Haaram showcases a classic Telugu design featuring a meticulously handcrafted paisley arrangement. The central pendant adds sophistication. The pendant and necklace both contain emeralds in the centre. The layers of stones lead to the central pendant. Each element is delicately framed with high-quality Kundan stones.
colors: Predominantly gold with the brilliance of white Kundan diamonds and a striking central Emerald green.
occasions: Ideal for traditional South Indian weddings (Muhurtham)
or any grand celebration where a touch of regal elegance is desired. Also suitable for upscale events and parties.
description: This Aaradhya Haaram is a timeless heirloom piece. The exceptional Kundan craftsmanship, combined with the auspicious Emerald, makes it a treasured possession. The Hyderabadi polish guarantees lasting beauty and value. Make a statement with the intricate detail and unparalleled sparkle of this gorgeous piece!
